ext_descrip.message: Take control of Pandora, Google Music, and many more!

ext_longdescrip.message:
Control Pandora from an extension button!

Click
Once: play or pause
Twice: open the Mini Player

Other configurable options include: skip a song, toggle between the pandora tab and back, thumb up or down

More features coming soon!

Please direct questions or requests or bug reports to pandoracontrolext@gmail.com for now

Not affiliated with Pandora Media Inc.
